About Us

Specialising in herbs & spices, we deliver fresh organically germinated seeds and plants to your door. We're gardeners and grow these veg for our own use at home, so we really know how they grow & taste.

  • Home compostable packaging
  • Seeds and young plants available
  • Wide variety of herbs & spices available
  • Fast shipping

 

How to Grow

Once to have recieved our products, growing them is easy.
